NK040(thi)011:2: phata phata phatah rang nyid rje btsun ma dmar mo
NK040(thi)011:3: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pas mi lpags kyi g.yang
NK040(thi)011:4: gzhi bsnams zhing / g.yon pas mi rkang gi gling bu 'bud par gyur /
NK040(thi)011:5: phatah 'o gtso bo gdon chen bco brgyad /
NK040(thi)011:6: byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga /
NK040(thi)011:11: mtho srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dma' na rag dmyal khams yan chad /
NK040(thi)011:12: bar snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad 'dir 'dus shig /
NK040(thi)011:13: phatah 'o khyad par gnyan khrod chen po 'di la gnas pa'i dkar po lha /
NK040(thi)011:20: pho mo ma nang gi sde tshan thams cad 'dir 'dus shig /
NK040(thi)011:21: phatah de ltar 'dus lha 'dre thams cad bdag la nyon cig /
NK040(thi)011:22: khyed rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)011:23: bdag gis khyed rnams la zab mo chos kyi 'brel ba byed /
NK040(thi)011:24: dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
NK040(thi)011:25: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas /
NK040(thi)011:26: rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god pa yin
NK040(thi)011:27: pas yid dad gus dang ldan pas nyon la phrin
NK040(thi)011:30: rje btsun ma dmar mo'i zil gnon ni /
NK040(thi)011:31: phatah rang nyid rje btsun ma dmar mo zhal gcig /
NK040(thi)011:33: sku stod mi mngon nam mkha'i dbyings su sleb pa /
NK040(thi)011:34: sku smad zhabs gnyis rlung ri nag po rdo rje rgya gram la brten /
NK040(thi)011:35: spyan gsum mi mngon nam mkha'i dbyings su /
NK040(thi)011:38: dbus ma khrag mtsho khol ba /
NK040(thi)011:39: phyag g.yas mi lpags g.yang gzhi dmar lhab lhab phyar ba /
NK040(thi)011:40: g.yon pas mi rkang gling bu tshag tshag 'bud pas khams gsum dbang du sdud pa /
NK040(thi)011:41: srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa /
NK040(thi)011:42: bar snang lha srin sde brgyad 'dar shig shig byed pa gcig tu gyur /
NK040(thi)011:43: phata phata phata de nas zil gnon bskul ba ni /
